Name: Hoffman House
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A shaken Wet (5:1) Martini with orange bitters.
History: Apparently the house cocktail at Manhattan's Hoffman House in the 1880s.
Nutrition: One serving of Hoffman House contains 183 calories
